English: to surpass all others of its kind before and since
francais: surpasser tous les autres avant dans un domaine

h.p: qián wú gǔ rén hòu wú lái zhě

English: to surpass all others of its kind before and since
to have neither predecessors nor successors
francais: surpasser tous les autres avant dans un domaine
